Register of all Officers and Agents, Civil, Military, and Naval, in the Service of

footnotes.text: 1Hugh Lamaster wrote the letter, which he and William Phelps both signed.
2For more on Joel Wrightâ€™s removal as postmaster, seeHugh Martin to Abraham Lincoln.

3Wright received the appointment of postmaster at Canton, replacing Henry Hipple sometime
                  after September 1849, and held the position until 1855.Register of all Officers and Agents, Civil, Military, and Naval, in the Service of
